name: connect-game
description: A Connect 4 inspired browser game. Built using React, Node, Socket.io, and Typescript.
author: Emmad Usmani <emmadusmani@berkeley.edu>

scripts.dev: yarn workspaces foreach -vpi --exclude connect-game run start
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn workspace @connect-game/shared build && yarn workspace @connect-game/server build && yarn workspace @connect-game/client build
